hero.tagline: Made by neurodivergent minds, for neurodivergent minds
hero.title: Your ADHD-Friendly Mission Control Center
hero.subtitle: Transform chaos into clarity with a productivity app that actually understands how your brain works. Built by a neurodivergent team who gets it, because we live it.

focus.title: Focus Mode That Gets You
focus.description: Designed for the ADHD brain, our intelligent timer system adapts to your unique focus patterns
benefits: Body-doubling feature with virtual accountability partners
Flexible Pomodoro timers that adapt to your energy levels
Ambient space sounds to maintain focus and block distractions
Visual time tracking that makes time feel tangible

achievement.title: Achievement Tracking That Celebrates You
achievement.description: Because every small win deserves recognition, especially on tough executive function days
benefits: Dopamine-boosting celebration animations for completed tasks
Visual progress tracking that motivates without overwhelming
Customizable reward system for your unique interests
Streak tracking that's forgiving and autism-friendly

missions.title: Daily Missions for Your Unique Journey
missions.description: Transform overwhelming tasks into manageable, exciting space missions
benefits: Task breakdown system for executive function support
Flexible routines that adapt to energy fluctuations
Emergency 'Reset Mission' feature for overwhelming moments

alex.quote: As someone with ADHD, traditional productivity apps never clicked. MissionControl's space theme and flexible timers finally make task management feel natural, not forced. The body-doubling feature is a game-changer for my focus!
alex.author: Alex Chen
alex.title: Software Developer with ADHD

sarah.quote: The sensory-friendly design and customizable interface means I can adjust everything to my comfort level. As an autistic individual, having this control while maintaining structure is invaluable.
sarah.author: Sarah Martinez
sarah.title: Digital Artist & Autism Advocate

jordan.quote: Finally, an app that understands executive dysfunction! The 'Reset Mission' feature helps me bounce back on tough days without shame. It's like having a supportive friend who really gets it.
jordan.author: Jordan Taylor
jordan.title: Student & ADHD Content Creator

about.title: Built Different, Because We Are Different
about.description: MissionControl wasn't born in a typical startup incubator. It was created by a team of neurodivergent developers, designers, and productivity enthusiasts who understand the unique challenges of ADHD and autism firsthand. We've poured our experiences, struggles, and breakthroughs into every feature.

cta.title: Ready for Launch?
cta.description: Join our neurodivergent community of 50,000+ space explorers who are conquering tasks, building routines, and celebrating victories together.
